subanswer.text: Since each chocolate bar weighs 40g and they weigh twice as much as the candied apples, then each candied apple would weigh 40 / 2 = 20g. 0.user_question: Joe's bag of Halloween candy has 8830531 chocolate bars and 80 candied apples. Each chocolate bar weighs twice as much as each candied apple. If each chocolate bar weighs 40g, how much does Joe's bag of candy weigh, in grams?

1.subquestion: Firstly, what will be the weight of all candied apples if one such piece weights w gm (unknown)?

subanswer.text: Since each chocolate bar weighs 40g and they weigh twice as much as the candied apples, then each candied apple would weigh 40 / 2 = 20g.
